hero.title: Logic meets
hero.descriptionSub: Front-end Engineer with 8 years of Marketing strategy experience.

philosophy.title: The Engineering Philosophy
philosophy.quote: I build digital bridges between complex code and human emotion.
philosophy.content: I pivoted from 8 years of marketing to engineering because I wanted to master the how. Today, I use my strategic background to build components that aren't just clean code, but conversion-optimized interactions.

projects.name: E-commerce Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics platform for online stores

items.description: Focusing on high-performance web apps using Next.js and Tailwind. Implemented Headless UI design systems.
Led digital transformation strategies. This previous life allows me to communicate effectively with product managers.

items.title: Technical Deep Dive
items.description: Moving beyond React to understand system-level programming. Currently building small CLIs with Rust to grasp memory management.

items.title: Reading
items.description: Re-reading "Clean Architecture" to write more maintainable, scalable frontend codebases.

items.title: Agent Fabric AI Platform
items.subtitle: Enterprise AI Chatbot Builder
items.problem: Enterprises need to quickly build customized AI chatbots, but existing solutions lack flexibility and are difficult to integrate. A platform that connects multiple AI models with real-time interaction is needed.
items.outcome: Successfully built a GPT-like conversational interface with knowledge base system, supporting multi-turn dialogue, file upload, and task automation, significantly lowering the barrier for enterprises to adopt AI.

items.title: LandScape Data Platform
items.subtitle: Visual Data Analytics Dashboard
items.problem: Clients need real-time monitoring of large datasets, but existing tools have poor performance and lack responsive design, making it difficult to operate smoothly across devices.
items.outcome: Built a scalable SPA architecture with full RWD support, 60% improvement in data loading speed, supporting real-time data updates and interactive charts.

items.title: PainShelter Narrative Platform
items.subtitle: Interactive Storytelling Experience
items.problem: Need to create an immersive interactive storytelling experience, integrating complex animations, sound effects, and multi-page state management while ensuring smooth user experience.
items.outcome: Successfully delivered a narrative-rich SPA with 15+ interactive animation scenes, average user session time of 8 minutes, won Best Experience Award at AppWorks Demo Day.

contact.title: Ready to build something robust?
contact.description: Looking for engineering roles that value both code quality and user experience.

hero.title: Insight meets
hero.descriptionSub: Senior Strategist with a developer's technical edge.

philosophy.title: The Strategic Philosophy
philosophy.quote: I don't just optimize funnels; I design user journeys that feel human.
philosophy.content: With 8 years of experience in Digital Transformation and Brand Strategy, I know that data without story is noise. My unique advantage? I can not only plan the strategy but understand the technical feasibility of execution, bridging the gap between CMOs and CTOs.

items.description: Specialized in CRO, User Journey Mapping, and Brand Positioning for FMCG clients.

items.title: FMCG Digital Transformation
items.problem: Legacy brand with < 0.5% conversion rate on D2C channels.
items.result: Redesigned funnel based on data, achieving a 200% increase in conversion.

items.title: Global Rebranding Campaign
items.problem: Disjointed brand messaging across APAC markets.
items.result: Unified content strategy that increased organic traffic by 45%.

contact.title: Need a strategy that converts?
contact.description: Let's discuss how we can tell your brand's story effectively.

about.title: About Tiny Daily Life
about.quote: Beyond the fast-paced tech industry, I believe the tiny moments in life are the real treasures.
about.content: This is my space for sharing life, healing, and growth. No KPIs, no OKRs, just authentic daily moments, occasional insights, and a curiosity and love for life.

podcast.title: Tiny Daily Life
podcast.description: A space about life, healing, and companionship. Here, we talk about daily life, feelings, and stories that data can't capture.

episodes.title: EP.12 Finding Your Rhythm in the Busy Life
EP.11 Lessons Learned on the Career Change Journey
EP.10 How to Stay Creative at Work?

items.title: Authenticity Over Perfection
items.description: Not chasing the perfect image, just being the real me.

items.title: Power of Tiny Moments
items.description: Great changes often start from tiny daily choices.

items.title: The Art of Slowing Down
items.description: In a fast-paced world, learning to enjoy every present moment.

contact.title: Want to chat?
contact.description: Whether it's collaboration, life talk, or just saying hi, feel free to reach out.

hero.title: 賦予美感
hero.description: 擁有 PM 視角，致力於構建符合市場需求的產品。
hero.descriptionSub: 擁有 8 年以上行銷與專案管理背景，能將產品思維融入技術開發的前端工程師。

philosophy.title: 與AI共融的Vibe Coding
philosophy.quote: 橋接技術開發與產品思維。
philosophy.content: 我擁有 1.5 年以上的前端開發經驗，並結合過去 8 年的行銷背景，這讓我這不僅能寫出可擴展的程式碼，更能從使用者體驗與商業目標的角度優化產品。

projects.name: 國內市場趨勢追蹤平台
projects.description: 尋找市場趨勢，掌握市場脈動

projects.name: 數位聊天室
projects.description: 依環境變數切換不同數位工具的聊天室

projects.description: 串接經濟部資料庫，提供台灣資訊服務業者的查詢與篩選功能

projects.name: AI Agent 協作平台
projects.description: 建立機器人聊天室，掛載個人知識庫，提供個人化服務，提高工作效率

items.company: 易勝資訊 (委派至資策會數位轉型部門)
items.description: 專注於 SaaS 產品開發，運用 React、TypeScript 等現代前端技術，進行系統介面建構與即時互動功能網頁。
開發部落格式 SPA 平台與電商網站。使用 React, Firebase, GSAP 打造沉浸式體驗。

items.title: React 生態系深耕
items.description: 專注於 Next.js 架構優化與複雜狀態管理（Zustand, Jotai, Redux）的實作應用。

items.title: 持續學習
items.description: 探索系統架構設計，並持續精進 TypeScript 與現代化前端工具鏈（Vite, Docker）。

items.title: 國內市場趨勢追蹤平台
items.subtitle: 依據網路爬蟲領域關鍵字、監測Github Hugging Face等相關成長數據，對應國內公司資訊，依照微光、新興、主流趨勢，提供相對應政策
items.problem: 需整合異質數據源（網路爬蟲、API、內部資料庫），且數據更新頻繁，對系統效能造成巨大挑戰。
items.outcome: 建立「技術-廠商」關聯資料庫，智慧媒合國際趨勢與國內供應鏈，為政府與投資人提供具體的策略建議地圖。

items.title: 數位聊天室
items.subtitle: 依環境變數切換不同數位工具的聊天室
items.problem: 面對不同業務端的聊天需求，缺乏一套能夠快速抽換設定的通用解決方案。
items.outcome: 開發具備高度彈性的聊天平台，利用環境變數控制 API 端點與 UI 風格，成功支援多組內部工具的即時通訊需求。

items.title: 台灣資訊服務業者資料庫
items.subtitle: 串接經濟部資料庫，提供台灣資訊服務業者的查詢與篩選功能
items.problem: 企業尋找資訊服務商如同大海撈針，缺乏透明的資訊與比較基準；缺乏直覺的篩選與搜尋機制，使用者必須手動比對資料，耗時且效率低落。
items.outcome: 成功串接經濟部 API，運用 React 與 Jotai 打造高效能的響應式查詢平台，實現即時多條件篩選，大幅優化資訊檢索體驗。

items.title: AI Agent 協作平台
items.subtitle: 類Dify串接AI工具平台
items.problem: 企業需要快速建構客製化 AI 聊天機器人，但現有方案缺乏彈性且整合困難。需要一個能連接多種 AI 模型、支援即時互動的平台。
items.outcome: 成功打造 GPT-like 對話介面與知識庫系統，支援多輪對話、檔案上傳、任務自動化功能，大幅降低企業導入 AI 的門檻。

contact.title: 準備好打造強健的產品了嗎？
contact.description: 尋找重視程式碼品質與使用者體驗的工程職位。

hero.title: 數據遇見
hero.descriptionSub: 具備 5 年行銷與政府標案管理經驗，擅長跨部門溝通。

philosophy.title: 策略哲學
philosophy.quote: 數據分析與人性化溝通的結合。
philosophy.content: 憑藉 5 年的行銷與專案管理經驗，我深知如何利用數據工具追蹤成效，並透過有效的溝通協調，確保專案在預算內精準執行。

items.description: 管理政府標案與預算執行。利用數據分析工具追蹤網站使用情況，優化使用者互動策略。

items.title: 政府標案管理
items.tech: 專案管理 • 預算控管
items.problem: 需管理複雜的政府標案流程與預算執行。
items.result: 成功執行專案預算，確保標案順利進行與結案。

items.title: 網站數據優化
items.tech: 數據分析 • 用戶互動
items.problem: 需要追蹤並提升網站的使用者參與度。
items.result: 透過數據分析工具監測流量，制定優化策略提升互動。

contact.title: 需要能落地執行的策略嗎？
contact.description: 結合技術與行銷思維，協助團隊達成目標。

hero.title: 微小日常
hero.descriptionSub: 探索療癒、陪伴與自我成長的旅程。

about.title: 關於微小日常
about.quote: 在快節奏的科技業工作之餘，我相信生活中的微小時刻才是真正的寶藏。
about.content: 這裡是我分享生活、療癒與成長的空間。不談 KPI，不講 OKR，只有真實的日常、偶爾的感悟，以及對生活的好奇與熱愛。

podcast.title: 微小日常
podcast.description: 一個關於生活、療癒與陪伴的空間。在這裡，我們聊日常、聊感受、聊那些數據無法捕捉的故事。
